Articles.Content:
Hi,

I lust got NEAR and have made a few NEAR planes.

Will they work for people who ues them with squad's sloppydynamics?

thanks

Some possibly will. Others probably don't.

Best way to find out is to make a separate install of KSP without NEAR and find out.

Some possibly will. Others probably don't.

Best way to find out is to make a separate install of KSP without NEAR and find out.

This is probably the best answer for this question.

But in most cases if it works in FAR or NEAR it will work in the Soupo'sphere.
